item.title: Report X-2024091801
item.description:
Report X-2024091801

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-02T09:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-26
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A PACKAGE WITH NO DOT LABELS ON THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND WITH 3X13.5 FLUID OZ REGULATED METAL AEROSOL BOTTLES OF CHOSEN FOODS 100% PURE AVOCADO SPRAY NO RELEASE. THE NON REGULATED 3X33.8FLOZ GLASS BOTTLES OF CHOSEN FOOD AVOCADO OIL SHATTERED AND THE CONTENTS LEAKED OUT. THERE IS NO DOT LABEL ON THIS PACKAGE MAKING IT UNPROCESSED
